title: A Traveler’s Journal - Novel Updates
author: YakumoHilker
description:
Pure white boundless clouds stretched out like the sea, circling around the mountain range.

The mountain’s elevation, from the foot to the peak, was more than enough let one say they were walking in the skies.

A young man and lady drove in black and green MINI car to camp in such a mountain.

'I don't know if the world is beautiful or not, but this world is a big one, isn't it? To explore this entire world, that is precisely our dreams, am I not right, Sherlock.'

'That's why we traveled together to make this boring life more brilliant, Ullala.'

See the world in person before your life passes away.

This is the insignificant travel notes of this pair of traveling boy and girl.>
